agent.roboviz
Class RVDraw

java.lang.Object
  agent.roboviz.RVDraw

public class RVDraw
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for creating draw commands for RoboVis shapes

Author:
Justin Stoecker

Parameters:

newCircle

public static byte[] newCircle(float[] center,
                               float radius,
                               float thickness,
                               java.awt.Color color,
                               java.lang.String group)
Creates a circle draw command

Parameters:
center - - coordinates of circle (x,y)
radius - - radius of circle
thickness - - width of circle edge in pixels
color - - color of circle
group - - drawing group name

                             java.awt.Color color,

Creates a line draw command

Parameters:
a - - starting point
b - - ending point
thickness - - width of line in pixels
color - - color of line
group - - drawing group name
